snippet: Russia's second-largest bank VTB has joined Sberbank in saying it would halt new lending in Ukraine, underlining concerns over financial risks due to political turmoil in Kiev....

headline.print_headline: Russia's Largest Banks Halt New Loans in Ukraine Eyeing Political Risk
headline.main: Russia's Largest Banks Halt New Loans in Ukraine Eyeing Political Risk

lead_paragraph: Russia's second-largest bank VTB has joined Sberbank in saying it would halt new lending in Ukraine, underlining concerns over financial risks due to political turmoil in Kiev.
